OrgName.entry: ARTS PROJECT - SHEFFIELD TEACHING HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST

Desc.entry: Initiates and facilitates arts projects in all media across the five hospitals within the Trust. Provides a permanent art gallery in the Clocktower and Dining Room at the Northern General Hospital and on D floor at the Royal Hallamshire Hospital which sells artwork with 20% commission from sales funding the project. All funds raised are donated directly back into the hospital Art funds. All art projects are funded and supported by the Sheffield Hospitals Charitable Trust. Provides patients focused art activities across the Trust using all forms of visual and performing arts.
